Class JWTAuthOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.ext.auth.jwt.JWTAuthOptions

  • public class JWTAuthOptions
extends Object
    Options describing how an JWT Auth should behave.
    Author:
    Paulo Lopes
